sentences.en: Along with that, it must be added, went a strong pedantic and antiquarian strain.
sentences.cn: 必须指出一股强烈的学究尚古风气也随之产生了.

sentences.en: Diarmuid : Second - hand and antiquarian books, and sheet music ; they have something for everyone.
sentences.cn: 他们还有旧书和古物古玩类的书刊和各种乐谱.

sentences.en: I have my own small collection of antiquarian books and first editions my self " . "
sentences.cn: 我也收集了不少古书和 初版 书.

sentences.en: Stare Decisis at firstbe something of an antiquarian function , and this was easy enough to accept.
sentences.cn: 遵循先例初看起来有点像考古, 这是很轻易被接纳的.

sentences.en: The antiquarian refers the vase to the second century.
sentences.cn: 古董收藏家认为这花瓶是公元2世纪的文物.

sentences.en: The antiquarian tried to palm the painting off as a real Renoir.
sentences.cn: 古董商试图用那幅画冒充雷诺阿的原作出售.

sentences.en: The library is rich in historical and antiquarian works.
sentences.cn: 这个图书馆拥有大量的历史籍和古书.

sentences.en: The library is rich in historical books and antiquarian works.
